User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Important pages
Allow: /gallery
Allow: /about
Allow: /nft/
Allow: /pitch

# API endpoints - allow for better discovery
Allow: /api/nfts/
Allow: /api/cert/

# Admin pages - disallow
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/auth/
Disallow: /api/order
Disallow: /api/github

# Generated files
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /*.xml$

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://etchnft.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (be respectful)
Crawl-delay: 1
